Trigger.name: death
Trigger.script:
onDeath()
Reset_Reaver_Spells()
tempTimer(10, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("cstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("stand") ]])
tempTimer(15, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("cstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("north & east") ]])
tempTimer(20, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("cstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("to death med") ]])
tempTimer(25, [[ send ("gstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("cstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("gstatus Tell me or gstatus 'reportpos' to confirm.") ]])

Trigger.name: Join Group
Trigger.script: Tank = matches[2] send("opt autoloot 2") send("cstatus " .. myChar .. " has joined " .. Tank .. "'s group.") send("gstatus gstatus '" .. myChar .. " help' to see my commands.") disableTrigger("ReaverBots") disableTrigger("AllBots") disableTrigger("StableBots") disableTrigger("SpamMapForRepop") disableTrigger("ReaverSpamAbilities") setMyConfiguration("hpmonitor", "0", "1") disableTimer("scanner")

Trigger.name: Disband
Trigger.script: Tank = myChar send("group all") send("opt autoloot 2") disableTrigger("ReaverBots") disableTrigger("AllBots") disableTrigger("StableBots") disableTrigger("SpamMapForRepop") disableTimer("scanner")

Trigger.name: Stop Following
Trigger.script: send("ctell " .. myChar .. " has left " .. Tank .. "'s group.") send("group all") Tank = myChar

Trigger.name: rescueself
Trigger.script: if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then setMyConfiguration("RescueSelfHp", tonumber(matches[6]) , "1") send("gstatus I will rescue tank when I have more than or equal to ("..tostring(tonumber(matches[6]))..")hp.") end

Trigger.name: rescueat
Trigger.script: if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then setMyConfiguration("RescueTankHp", tonumber(matches[6]) , "1") send("gstatus I will rescue tank when they are equal to or below ("..tostring(tonumber(matches[6]))..")hp.") end

Trigger.name: refill canteens
Trigger.script: if Tank == gmcp.Char.Score.name or matches[2] == Tank then fillstring = "" expandAlias("refillwater") end

Trigger.name: sing
Trigger.script: expandAlias("reaversing")--setup this alias in your Custom_XXX folder

Trigger.name: help
Trigger.script:
myRescueTankHp = getMyConfiguration("rescuetankhp") myRescueSelfHp = getMyConfiguration("rescueselfhp")
if (string.lower(matches[6]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4)) and (string.lower(matches[7]) == "help" or string.lower(matches[7]) == "status") then
expandAlias("standardhelp") if myVariableTable["TankRescue"] then send("gstatus Automatic tank rescues are ON - gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " rescue [on|off]' to toggle.") send("gstatus "..gmcp.Char.Score.name.." will rescue tank when they are equal to or below ("..tostring(RescueTankHp)..") - gtell '"..string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " rescueat [number]' to configure.") send("gstatus "..gmcp.Char.Score.name.." will rescue tank when I have more than or equal to ("..tostring(RescueSelfHp)..") - gtell '"..string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " rescueself [number]' to configure.") else send("gstatus Automatic tank rescues are OFF - gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " rescue [on|off]' to toggle.") send("gstatus gtell '"..string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3).." reaverleechlist' - to see spells I cast on 'up'.") send("gstatus gtell '"..string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3).." reaverleech <spell>' - to add or remove spells recast on 'up'.") send("gstatus gtell '"..string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3).." reaverleechclear' - to remove all spells set to reset on 'up'.") send("gstatus gtell '"..string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3).." reaverleechreset' - to set all spells to inactive and recheck active affects.") end end

Trigger.name: pfree
Trigger.script: if gmcp.Group.leader ~= gmcp.Chare.Score.name then expandAlias("sle") end

Trigger.name: tank rescues on off
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
myRescueTankHp = getMyConfiguration("rescuetankhp") myRescueSelfHp = getMyConfiguration("rescueselfhp")
matchessix = matches[6]
if string.lower(matchessix) == "on" then if gmcp.Group.leader ~= gmcp.Char.Score.name then setMyConfiguration("TankRescue", 1, 1) send("gstatus "..gmcp.Char.Score.name.." has tank rescues enabled.") send("gstatus I will rescue tank when they are equal to or below ("..tostring(myRescueTankHp)..").") send("gstatus I will rescue tank when I have more than or equal to ("..tostring(myRescueSelfHp)..").") else setMyConfiguration("TankRescue", 0, 1) send("gstatus I cannot rescue myself while leading the group.") end elseif string.lower(matchessix) == "off" then setMyConfiguration("TankRescue", 0, 1) send("gstatus "..gmcp.Char.Score.name.." has tank rescues disabled.") end end

Trigger.name: rescue trigs2
Trigger.script: if gmcp.Group.leader == gmcp.Char.Score.name and table.contains(CharsInGroup, matches[2]) then send("rescue " .. matches[2] .. " & stand & rescue " .. matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: Almost as if expecting (\w+)\'s attack\, a minotaur bailiff quickly lashes
The lammasu swoops back\, then dives forward at (\w+) attacking with tremendous speed\.

Trigger.name: rescue worked
Trigger.script: send("gstatus " .. matches[2] .. " has been rescued by " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. ".")

Trigger.name: rescue trigs4
Trigger.script: if gmcp.Group.leader == gmcp.Char.Score.name and table.contains(CharsInGroup, matches[4]) then send("rescue " .. matches[4] .. " & stand & rescue " .. matches[4]) end

regexCodeList.string: A lammasu's claw of justice (\w+) \[(\d+)\] (\w+)'s arm\! \[ (.*) \]

Trigger.name: rescue trigs3
Trigger.script: if gmcp.Group.leader == gmcp.Char.Score.name and table.contains(CharsInGroup, matches[3]) then send("rescue " .. matches[3] .. " & stand & rescue " .. matches[3]) end

regexCodeList.string: stops attacking (\w+) and leaps to attack (\w+)\.
Your entropic orb dissolves into goop.
You report clan status: "(.*) just improved to 10."

Trigger.name: rite of enfeeblement
Trigger.script: tempTimer(120, [[ sendAll( "|leech Rite Of Enfeeblement", "|perform rite of enfeeblement") ]] )

Trigger.name: rite of destruction
Trigger.script: tempTimer(120, [[ sendAll( "|leech Rite Of destruction", "|perform rite of destruction") ]] )

Trigger.name: rite of wroth
Trigger.script: tempTimer(120, [[ sendAll( "|leech Rite Of wroth", "|perform rite of wroth") ]] )

Trigger.name: rite of arcane detection
Trigger.script: tempTimer(120, [[ sendAll( "|remove orb", "|perform rite of illumination", "|perform rite of arcane detection") ]] )

regexCodeList.string: +++ You perform rite of arcane detection +++

Trigger.name: rite of marking
Trigger.script: tempTimer(120, [[ sendAll( "|remove orb", "|perform rite of illumination", "|perform rite of marking") ]] )

Trigger.name: rite of disorder
Trigger.script: tempTimer(120, [[ sendAll( "|leech Rite Of disorder", "|perform rite of disorder") ]] )

regexCodeList.string: You are surrounded by a nebulous cloud.
You merge your entropic orbs into a more powerful orb.
An entropic orb begins to circle above your head.
You merge your entropic orbs, but it feels no more powerful.
Your entropic orb dissolves into goop.
(A|An) .* you are wielding appears strangely malevolent.
You can't perform rite of malediction; try casting it instead.
[A|An] *. you are wielding now holds a curse.
Your vision is enhanced to sense warmth.
Your eyes can no longer sense warmth.
Your entropic orb dissolves into goop.
You can see the magic around you.
You no longer see the working of magic.
Your entropic orb dissolves into goop.
You are already full of Ulthi's destructive chaos.
You no longer channel Ulthi's destructive chaos.
You are full of Ulthi's wroth.
You are already full of Ulthi's wroth.
You reason with Ulthi's enfeebling illogic.
You already reason with Ulthi's enfeebling illogic.
You no longer reason with Ulthi's enfeebling illogic.
You are surrounded by a nebulous cloud.
The nebulous cloud surrounding you dissipates.
[A|An] *. you are wielding appears strangely malevolent.
You begin to sense your surroundings - even in total darkness.
You can no longer sense your surroundings without light.
Your entropic orb dissolves into goop.

Trigger.name: primary leeches offline
Trigger.script: send("gstatus My primary leeches are offline - gtell up for me to recast")

Trigger.name: reaver leech - edit leeched spells
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from abilities where ability = '"..tostring(matches[5]).."' and level > 0 and character = '"..gmcp.Char.Score.name.."' limit 1" local resultsabil = db:fetch_sql(mydb.abilities, mysql)
--Check to see if I have the ability prac'd to at least level 1 if next(resultsabil) then local mysql = "select * from reaverfadedspells where spell = '"..resultsabil[1].ability.."' and character = '"..gmcp.Char.Score.name.."' limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.reaverfadedspells, mysql) --Check to see if ability exists in reaverfadedspells table if next(results) then --if yes, then flip to no if results[1].alwaysonline == "yes" then results[1].alwaysonline = "no" db:update(mydb.reaverfadedspells, results[1]) send("gstatus "..resultsabil[1].ability.." has been removed from reaverleech.") --If no, then flip to yes else results[1].alwaysonline = "yes" db:update(mydb.reaverfadedspells, results[1]) send("gstatus "..resultsabil[1].ability.." is now to set recast on reaverleech.") end --didn't exist, so add and set to yes else db:add(mydb.reaverfadedspells, {character=gmcp.Char.Score.name, spell=resultsabil[1].ability, leeched="no", alwaysonline="yes"}) send("gstatus " .. resultsabil[1].ability .. " is now to set recast on reaverleech.") end else send("gstatus I don't know the ability: "..resultsabil[1].ability) end end

Trigger.name: reaver leech list
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from reaverfadedspells where character = '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. "' and alwaysonline = 'yes' order by spell" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.reaverfadedspells, mysql) local spelllist = {} send("gstatus Here are the spells I leech:") if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do --Build a table of spells so as to consolidate all the records into row for output if row.leeched == "yes" then spellonline = "(active)" else spellonline = "(offline)" end --table.insert(spelllist, row.spell..spellonline) send("gstatus -"..row.spell.." ( "..spellonline.." )") end
else send("gstatus There are no spells in the database.") end end

Trigger.name: reaver leech clear
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills") db:set(mydb.reaverfadedspells.alwaysonline, "no", db:eq(mydb.reaverfadedspells.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)) send("gstatus reaverleech spell list has been cleared.")
end

Trigger.name: reaver leech reset
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
Reset_Rever_Spells() end

Script.name: ReaverScripts
